publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Jonah 3
ab.l: Da boldu navilik śoźu H-nyn Jonaɣa ėkińči for ajtadoɣoč.
Tur- ɣun barɣyn Nińev́eǵa ol ullu šaɣarɣa da čaɣyrɣyn anar ol čaɣyrmaḥny ki ḿeń śoźĺarmiń saja.
Da turdu Jona da bardy Nińev́eǵa śoźuńa ḱoŕa H-nyn da Nińev́e ėdi ullu šahar T́eńriǵa jol üč́ ḱuńĺuk.
Da bašlady Jona keĺḿa šaharɣa jol bir ḱuńĺuk da čaɣyrdy da ajtty hanuz qyrḥ ḱuń- d́ań da Nińev́e aḥtarylɣan bolur.
Da inandylar ėli Nińev́eniń T́eńriǵa da čaɣyr- dylar oruč da kijińdiĺar kijiźĺar ulludan kičiǵa d́ejiń.
Da jet́ti ol śoź bijińa Nińev́eniń da turdu taḥtyndan da ket́ardi syjly upraɣyn üśt́uńd́ań da qaplandy kijiź byla da olturdu ol ḱuĺ üśt́uńa.
Da ašyrdy bujruḥ da ajtty Nińev́ed́a śoźuńd́ań ol bijniń da aɣalyḥlarynyn ajtadoɣoč ol adam da ol tuvar ol syɣyr da ol qoj tatmasynlar ńeḿed́a ḱut́uĺḿasińĺar da suvlar ič́ḿasińĺar.
Da qaplansynlar kijiźĺar ol adam da ol tuvar da čaɣyrsynlar T́eńriǵa ḱuč́ byla da qajtsynlar kiši jolundan ol jaman da ol avanlyḥtan ki uvučlarynda.
Kim biĺadir šeḿe qajtyr da źeĺĺanir ol T́eńri da qajtyr qaḥyr ačuvundan da taspolmazbyz.

Da ḱord́u ol T́eńri iš́ĺariń ki qajttylar jollaryndan ol jaman da źeĺĺańdi ol T́eńri ol jamanlyḥ
üč́uń ki śoźĺadi qylma alarɣa da qylmady.
